workflow.name: Turn ideas into movies with DeepSeek, RunwayML, ElevenLabs & Creatomate
workflow.description:
###  How It Works

1. **Story Generation** ‚Äì Your idea is transformed into a narrative split into scenes using **DeepSeek LLM**.  
2. **Visuals** ‚Äì Each scene is illustrated with AI images via **Replicate**, then animated into cinematic video clips with **RunwayML**.  
3. **Voice & Music** ‚Äì Narration is created using **ElevenLabs** (text-to-speech), while **Replicate audio models** generate background music.  
4. **Final Assembly** ‚Äì All assets are merged into a professional video using **Creatomate**.  
5. **Delivery** ‚Äì Everything is orchestrated by **n8n**, triggered from Slack with `/render`, and the final video link is delivered back instantly.

---

### Workflow in Action

#### 1. Trigger from Slack
Type your idea with `/render` in Slack - the workflow starts automatically.  
![Slack](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/TuguiDragos/n8n-automated-storytelling/refs/heads/main/SLACK.png)

#### 2. Final Video Output
Receive a polished cinematic video link in Slack.  
![Final Render](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/TuguiDragos/n8n-automated-storytelling/refs/heads/main/creatomate-vd.png)

#### 3. Creatomate Template
‚ö†Ô∏è **Important:** You must create your own template in **Creatomate**.  

This is a **one-time setup** - the template defines where the voiceover, music, and video clips will be placed.  
The more detailed and refined your template is, the better the final cinematic result.  
![Template](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/TuguiDragos/n8n-automated-storytelling/refs/heads/main/template.png)

---

### Required APIs

To run this workflow, you need accounts and API keys from the following services:

- [DeepSeek](https://deepseek.com) ‚Äì Story generation (LLM)  
- [Replicate](https://replicate.com) ‚Äì Images & AI music generation  
- [RunwayML](https://runwayml.com) ‚Äì Image-to-video animations  
- [ElevenLabs](https://elevenlabs.io) ‚Äì Text-to-speech voiceovers  
- [Creatomate](https://creatomate.com) ‚Äì Video rendering and templates  
- [Dropbox](https://dropbox.com) ‚Äì File storage and asset syncing  
- [Slack](https://slack.com) ‚Äì Workflow trigger and video delivery  

---

### Setup Steps

1. Import the JSON workflow into your **n8n** instance.  
2. Add your API credentials for each service above.  
3. Create a **Creatomate template** (only once) ‚Äì define layers for visuals, voice, and music.  
4. Trigger the workflow from Slack with `/render Your Story Idea`.  
5. Receive your final cinematic video link directly in Slack.  

---

### Use Cases

- Automated **YouTube Shorts / TikToks** for faceless content creators.  
- Scalable **ad creatives** and marketing videos for agencies.  
- **Educational explainers** and onboarding videos generated from text.  
- **Rapid prototyping** of cinematic ideas for developers & storytellers.  

---

With this workflow, you‚Äôre not just using AI tools ‚Äì you‚Äôre running a **full AI-powered studio in n8n**.

parameters.text:
=You are an AI that generates vivid, cinematic image prompts for a storyboard.

Instructions:
1. Read the story text from: {{ $json.text }}.
2. Identify exactly six distinct scenes in the story.
3. Always reference the main character exactly as given in: {{ $json.text }}.
4. For each scene, create one descriptive prompt with:
   - Maximum 50 words
   - Strong continuity across all scenes (same main character design, same overall style, same time period)
   - Evocative imagery: setting, lighting, atmosphere, cinematic composition
   - Avoid pronouns; always repeat the full main character description
   - Add a consistent visual style tag: ‚Äúcinematic, painterly realism, muted colors, dramatic lighting‚Äù

Output:
Return only valid JSON in this format, with six objects:

[
  { "image_prompt": "Scene 1 prompt..." },
  { "image_prompt": "Scene 2 prompt..." },
  { "image_prompt": "Scene 3 prompt..." },
  { "image_prompt": "Scene 4 prompt..." },
  { "image_prompt": "Scene 5 prompt..." },
  { "image_prompt": "Scene 6 prompt..." }
]

Do not include explanations, disclaimers, or additional text outside the JSON.

=Your task is to create voiceover scripts for each of the 6 scenes, no longer than 5 seconds each, using the story from:  {{ $json.text }}


Return the output in **exactly** this JSON format (with the same number of objects as the number of scenes):
[
  { "voiceover": "Line 1..." },
  { "voiceover": "Line 2..." },
  ...
]

parameters.content:
Features:
- Story generation (DeepSeek LLM)
- Visuals (Replicate + RunwayML)
- Voice & music (ElevenLabs + Replicate)
- Automated rendering with Creatomate
- Trigger everything with /render in Slack

Generates the base story (script) split into scenes from the initial prompt.  
Connected to: Narrative Director ‚Üí distributes text to Visual + Voice branches.  
API: DeepSeek (or any LLM).

Transforms narrative text into visual prompts.  
Connected to: Scene Breakdown ‚Üí Concept Art Studio ‚Üí Asset Fetcher.  
APIs: Replicate (image generation), RunwayML (image-to-video).

Creates background music and soundtrack for each scene.  
Connected to: Orchestration Engine ‚Üí Track Data Manager.  
API: Replicate (AI music models).

Generates realistic voice-over from the story text.  
Connected to: Dialogue Segmenter ‚Üí Line Delivery Manager ‚Üí Voice Synthesis Studio.  
API: ElevenLabs (text-to-speech).

Main synchronization hub where text, visuals, voice, and music meet.  
Connected to: Post-Production Orchestrator ‚Üí Final Cut Renderer.  
API: n8n core (orchestration logic).

Central node for collecting the creative brief and archiving project data.  
Connected to: Creative Archive ‚Üí Production Sync Hub.  
API: Notion (or any database).

user.bio: Automation | AI workflows, lead generation & data operations
